short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that will help you follow GitHub Organisations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Org monster is a chrome extension that will help you follow the activities of all your favorite GitHub organisations conveniently in one place.

Features:
1. Manage all the organisations that you want to follow
2. View all the activities of the organisation
3. Filter activities feed based on organisation
4. Filter activities feed based on activity or event type
